Introduction
This topic contains information on the finality and irrevocability of pension elections, including
persons authorized to make elections
discounting the requirements of Supplemental Security Income (SSI)Â or other non-VA benefits when considering the validity of an election
the finality of an election
, and
circumstances in which an election may be voided

title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C - Elections Between Pension Programs
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C
